dict.string:
# if we have offline edits, send them now (assumes we're actually online again) if [[ -e "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineEdits.txt" ]]; then "$TM_P4" -x "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineEdits.txt" edit && rm "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineEdits.txt" fi
# if we have offline adds, send them now (assumes we're actually online again) if [ -e "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineAdds.txt" ]; then "$TM_P4" -x add "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineAdds.txt" && rm "$HOME/P4Cache/OfflineAdds.txt" fi
